p: To measure VLP production from NLuc-VP40, NLuc-VP40-L117R, or NLuc alone ( Figure 4B), we quantified raw NLuc intensities ( n = 6 biological replicates each). To assess statistical significance, we performed a repeated measures ANOVA (rANOVA) with Dunnettâ€™s post-test, in which each condition was compared to NLuc-VP40 to generate corrected p-values using Prism 7.
